tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE risk_assessment_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_title VARCHAR(255),
  report_date DATE,
  assessed_by VARCHAR(100),
  assessment_result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE department (
  department_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  department_name VARCHAR(100),
  department_head VARCHAR(100),
  location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE employee (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(255),
  department_id INT,
  hire_date DATE,
  job_title VARCHAR(100),
  salary DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE audit_log (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  action VARCHAR(50),
  action_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  performed_by VARCHAR(100),
  report_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES risk_assessment_reports(report_id)
)

CREATE TABLE risk_assessment_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_name VARCHAR(255),
  assessment_date DATE,
  risk_level VARCHAR(50),
  comments TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE employees (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_name VARCHAR(255),
  department VARCHAR(100),
  hire_date DATE,
  position VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE departments (
  dept_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  dept_name VARCHAR(100),
  manager_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE risk_factors (
  factor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  factor_name VARCHAR(100),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE reports_assessment_mapping (
  report_id INT,
  assessment_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES risk_assessment_reports(report_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (assessment_id) REFERENCES risk_factors(factor_id)
)
